title: Transposition sensor and phase sequence sensors
fullText:
If a transposition sensor is installed in a relocatable structure, the transposition sensor shall be installed to the requirements of Clause 2.6.4.2.
If a phase sequence sensor is installed in a relocatable structure, the phase sequence sensor shall be installed to the requirements of Clause 2.6.3.
See exceptions to Clauses 3.8.2.2, 3.8.3 and 3.8.6 regarding switches operating in all live (active and neutral) conductors.
